faqs.question: What causes frequent drain blockages?
faqs.answer: Common causes include grease buildup, hair, food waste, and improperly flushed items. Regular cleaning helps prevent repeat issues.

faqs.question: Can a plumber detect a broken underground drain pipe?
faqs.answer: Yes, many plumbers listed on Homezy use video inspection tools to locate and diagnose problems within underground or hard-to-reach pipes.
